1.title: The Science of Pathology
1.plot: The science of pathology and the key questions which the state pathologist has to try to answer when presented with a case of suspicious death - ie: .Identification of the body .Time of death .Cause of death Programme 1 also looks at some of the other related specialist areas which assist with the above tasks - eg entomology and forensic anthropology. Cases which Dr Cassidy refers to are used to illustrate aspects of her job.

2.title: The Role of the State Pathologist
2.plot: About the role of the State Pathologist and her often misunderstood responsibility as a neutral, expert witness. Inevitably high profile, controversial cases also turn the spotlight on Dr Cassidy..

imdb.plot outline: This series looks at the role of Dr. Marie Cassidy. Cassidy reflects on her cases, looking at the issues which impact on the rise of violent crime in Ireland. Focusing too on her response to the media interest which continues to surround her, Death Duties is a fascinating insight into one of our most public yet elusive figures. Dr. Marie Cassidy, the State Pathologist, is a figure of much public interest and she is rarely out of the spotlight. But few understand the nature of her position or the job which she does on a day to day basis. Death Duties gets closer to the woman and her profession.
imdb.title: Death Duties
plot: Dr. Marie Cassidy reflects on her cases, looking at the issues which impact on the rise of violent crime in Ireland. _Death Duties_ (qv) gets closer to the woman and her profession.::Stirling Film and Television
